welcome_message_body: Welcome to Itasca, a charming and picturesque city known for its natural beauty and friendly community. We hope you have a wonderful time exploring all that this city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Chicago O'hare International Airport, serving mainly domestic and some international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Chicago O'hare International Airport, serving mainly domestic and some international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The second largest terminal at Chicago O'hare International Airport, serving mainly domestic and some international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: The international terminal at Chicago O'hare International Airport, serving all international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require periodic re-connection.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pal-Waukee Airport houses all of the airport's amenities and services, including check-in counters, baggage claim, and various shops and restaurants.

terminals.name: Executive Terminal
terminals.description: The executive terminal at Pal-Waukee Airport is dedicated to private and charter flights, providing a more luxurious and exclusive experience for travelers.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport. Simply connect to the network and accept the terms and conditions to access the internet.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights for Southwest Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves international and domestic flights for Delta and Porter Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights for Delta and American Airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at Municipal Airport is equipped with customs and immigration facilities for international travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Municipal Airport caters to private and charter flights, offering a luxurious and exclusive experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lewis Lockport Airport, serving all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Lewis Lockport Airport, handling all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Memorial Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Memorial Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Municipal Airport is dedicated to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
